description:
Hordy`s men keep attacking, but the Straw Hats have new weapons at their disposal! Franky unleashes the fury of the Black Rhino, and Luffy turns the tables on Hordy with a little help from his Kraken!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hatsu Hirou! Sunny Gou no Himitsu Heiki!
Les armes secrètes du Sunny ! Inauguration
Unveiled! The Secret Weapons of the Sunny!
初披露! サニー号の秘密兵器!
